name: Well-Dressed Man
dialog: Hey! Glad you could make it.

name: Well-Dressed Man
dialog: Name's Bill. It's a pleasure meeting you.

name: Bill
dialog: You know why we're meeting like this, right? It's about the project.

name: Bill
dialog: The team and I... We're running low on time. We need some assistance if we're going to get it done before the fiscal year ends.

name: Bill
dialog: Hm... Actually...

name: Bill
dialog: Could we do this somewhere more private? I don't feel comfortable discussing company business in public like this.

name: Bill
dialog: Perhaps my home could suffice. Here, let me give you my address, so we can head on over.
(You go with Bill to his house, so you can discuss this important company matter with him.)

name: Bill
dialog: Here we are. Nice place, isn't it? I like to sit here on the couch to unwind after work.

name: Bill
dialog: Oh, here comes my wife. Hope she doesn't have any issues with me bringing a guest over.

name: Bill's Wife
dialog: Welcome home, honey! Hey, have you seen my-

name: Bill's Wife
dialog: Visitors.

name: Bill
dialog: We're here on company business, Carol.

name: Carol
dialog: Yeah, well last time you brought one of your coworkers here, they smashed the place up!

name: Carol
dialog: Do you know how expensive it was getting everything replaced? We're not made of money, you know!

name: Bill
dialog: Well you'll be happy to know that he's not my coworker anymore. He was fired after that incident.

name: Carol
dialog: So what? That doesn't just fix all the problems that lunatic caused in this house!

name: Bill
dialog: Ugh...

name: Bill
dialog: You're going to have to forgive her. We had an... incident with a former coworker of mine a while back.

name: Bill
dialog: Destroyed some very expensive stuff. Some priceless pottery, a huge TV we had on rental, several windows... It was a mess.

name: Carol
dialog: A mess that could have been avoided!

name: Bill
dialog: Quiet, honey.

name: Bill
dialog: Ugh, this is exactly what I was afraid of...

name: Bill
dialog: Look, Carol, if something happens while we're in here, I'll have this guy foot the bill.

name: Bill
dialog: ...Huh? Ah, no, I wasn't trying to make a pun there.

name: Bill
dialog: If you even think of kicking me like that implies, I'll KICK you out of this house!

name: Bill
dialog: Ha! Now THERE'S a pun to be proud of!

name: Bill
dialog: What?

name: Carol
dialog: Bill, sweetheart... I'm sorry, no offense, but that joke was just terrible.

name: Bill
dialog: Oh, like you could do better.

name: Carol
dialog: Try me. We'll see who the real pun master is around here!

name: Bill
dialog: I swear to god if you make that bike joke again I'm-

name: Carol
dialog: Hey bill? I think I know what your favorite part of Christmas is.

name: Bill
dialog: Oh god no, it's worse...

name: Carol
dialog: Can you guess? Can you guess what I think it is?

name: Bill
dialog: Please god no...

name: Carol
dialog: Your favorite part of Christmas is...

name: Bill
dialog: Make it stop...

name: Carol
dialog: Christmas Carols.

name: Bill
dialog: Why me...
[obligatory spongebob joke]

name: Caleb
dialog: Okay not really though, that's it for now.

name: Caleb
dialog: I know it doesn't have everything I need, but hey, at least I managed to get it working.

name: Caleb
dialog: I know it doesn't have everything I need, but hey, at least I managed to get it working.
